attributes.Name: Tilwalds
attributes.eventDescription: Looking for some Friday Fun for you and the kids?⭐  Join us to party & play bingo at Tilwards on Friday the 12th of May and you won't be disappointed🔥💗  In true Louby Lou and Ibiza style, we'll be giving away some fun prizes, dancing, and spreading laughter all around🙌

attributes.Name: Ewe Bar
attributes.eventDescription: School Holiday Fun at Ewe Restaurant🥳  📅Friday 2nd June 🕛12pm - 1:30pm 👫ALL AGES WELCOME!  ⚡What to expect: A party of a lifetime with Music🎶Saxophone🎷Games🥳Magic🪄Treats🍭& MORE...

attributes.Name: The Delph
attributes.eventDescription: IT'S TIME FOR TOTS AT THE DELPH💛 Join us for a morning filled with enjoyable activities, allowing your little one to engage, dance and build confidence whilst you have  an opportunity to connect with other parents/guardians. 🥳 Let's make some memories 😊
